tool_description: Comprehensive Weather API with Geocoding and Maps
name: TreeHouse Weather API
title: TreeHouse Weather API

api_list.name: getWeather
api_list.description: Retrieve weather data for given coordinates

optional_parameters.name: imageType
optional_parameters.description:
The TreeHouse Weather API creates maps in several formats, listed below:
* `roadmap` specifies a standard roadmap image, as is normally shown on the Google Maps website.
* `satellite` specifies a satellite image.
* `terrain` specifies a physical relief map image, showing terrain and vegetation.
* `hybrid` specifies a hybrid of the satellite and roadmap image, showing a transparent layer of major streets and place names on the satellite image.  If no maptype value is specified, the TreeHouse Weather API serves `hybrid` tiles by default.

optional_parameters.name: imageSize
optional_parameters.description: Defines the rectangular dimensions of the map image. This parameter takes a string of {*horizontal_value}x{vertical_value*}. For example, `500x400` defines a map 500 pixels wide by 400 pixels high. Maps smaller than 180 pixels in width will display a reduced-size Google logo.  The image dimension will default to `400x400` when the parameter is not provided.

optional_parameters.name: convertToMPH
optional_parameters.description: Converts speed to Mile per Hour (MPH) - defaults to Kilometers per Hour when not provided.

optional_parameters.name: convertToFahrenheit
optional_parameters.description: Converts temperature values to Fahrenheit—defaults to Celsius when not provided.
